00025 #include "lpc17xx_i2c.h"
00026 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00028 #include "debug_frmwrk.h"

00030 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00036 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00038 #define USEDI2CDEV_M            0
00039 
00040 #define I2CDEV_S_ADDR   (0x90>>1)
00041 
00043 #define BUFFER_SIZE                     0x10
00044 
00045 #if (USEDI2CDEV_M == 0)
00046 #define I2CDEV_M LPC_I2C0
00047 #elif (USEDI2CDEV_M == 2)
00048 #define I2CDEV_M LPC_I2C2
00049 #else
00050 #error "Master I2C device not defined!"
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00054 uint8_t menu1[] =
00055 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00056 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00057 "I2C demo \n\r"
00058 "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00059 "\t - Core: ARM Cortex-M3 \n\r"
00060 "\t - This example uses two I2C peripheral, one set as master and \n\r"
00061 "\t the other set as slave \n\r"
00062 "\t Test Master mode as alone device \n\r"
00063 "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00064 
00066 uint8_t Master_Buf[BUFFER_SIZE];
00067 uint8_t master_test[2];
00068 
00069 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00070 void print_menu(void);
00071 void Buffer_Init(uint8_t type);

00073 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS-----------------------------*/
00074 /*********************************************************************/
00079 void print_menu(void)
00080 {
00081         _DBG_(menu1);
00082 }
00083 
00084 /*********************************************************************/
00093 void Buffer_Init(uint8_t type)
00094 {
00095         uint8_t i;
00096 
00097         if (type)
00098         {
00099                 for (i = 0; i < BUFFER_SIZE; i++) {
00100                         Master_Buf[i] = i;
00101                 }
00102         }
00103         else
00104         {
00105                 for (i = 0; i < BUFFER_SIZE; i++) {
00106                         Master_Buf[i] = 0;
00107                 }
00108         }
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00113 /*********************************************************************/
00118 int c_entry(void)
00119 {
00120         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00121         I2C_M_SETUP_Type transferMCfg;
00122         uint32_t tempp;
00123         uint8_t *pdat;
00124 
00125         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00126          * – 115200bps
00127          * – 8 data bit
00128          * – No parity
00129          * – 1 stop bit
00130          * – No flow control
00131          */
00132         debug_frmwrk_init();
00133 
00134         print_menu();
00135 
00136 
00137         /* I2C block ------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00138 
00139         /*
00140          * Init I2C pin connect
00141          */
00142         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00143         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00144 #if ((USEDI2CDEV_M == 0))
00145         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00146         PinCfg.Pinnum = 27;
00147         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00148         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00149         PinCfg.Pinnum = 28;
00150         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00151 #endif
00152 #if ((USEDI2CDEV_M == 2))
00153         PinCfg.Funcnum = 2;
00154         PinCfg.Pinnum = 10;
00155         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00156         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00157         PinCfg.Pinnum = 11;
00158         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00159 #endif
00160 
00161         // Initialize Slave I2C peripheral
00162         I2C_Init(I2CDEV_M, 100000);
00163 
00164         /* Enable Slave I2C operation */
00165         I2C_Cmd(I2CDEV_M, ENABLE);
00166 
00167         /* Transmit -------------------------------------------------------- */
00168         _DBG_("Press '1' to transmit");
00169         while (_DG != '1');
00170         _DBG_("Start Transmit...");
00171 
00172         /* Initialize buffer */
00173         Buffer_Init(1);
00174 
00175         /* Start I2C slave device first */
00176         transferMCfg.sl_addr7bit = I2CDEV_S_ADDR;
00177         transferMCfg.tx_data = Master_Buf;
00178         transferMCfg.tx_length = sizeof(Master_Buf);
00179         transferMCfg.rx_data = NULL;
00180         transferMCfg.rx_length = 0;
00181         transferMCfg.retransmissions_max = 3;
00182         I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV_M, &transferMCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_POLLING);
00183 
00184 
00185         /* Receive -------------------------------------------------------- */
00186         _DBG_("Press '2' to receive");
00187         while(_DG != '2');
00188         _DBG_("Receive...");
00189 
00190         /* Initialize buffer */
00191         Buffer_Init(0);
00192 
00193         /* Start I2C slave device first */
00194         transferMCfg.sl_addr7bit = I2CDEV_S_ADDR;
00195         transferMCfg.tx_data = NULL ;
00196         transferMCfg.tx_length = 0;
00197         transferMCfg.rx_data = Master_Buf;
00198         transferMCfg.rx_length = sizeof(Master_Buf);
00199         transferMCfg.retransmissions_max = 3;
00200         I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV_M, &transferMCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_POLLING);
00201 
00202         pdat = Master_Buf;
00203         // Verify
00204         for (tempp = 0; tempp < sizeof(Master_Buf); tempp++){
00205                 if (*pdat++ != tempp){
00206                         _DBG_("Verify error");
00207                         break;
00208                 }
00209         }
00210         if (tempp == sizeof(Master_Buf)){
00211                 _DBG_("Verify successfully");
00212         }
00213 
00214 #if 1
00215         /* Transmit and receive -------------------------------------------------------- */
00216         _DBG_("Press '3' to Transmit, then repeat start and receive...");
00217         while (_DG != '3');
00218 
00219         /* Initialize buffer */
00220         Buffer_Init(0);
00221         master_test[0] = 0xAA;
00222         master_test[1] = 0x55;
00223 
00224         /* Start I2C slave device first */
00225         transferMCfg.sl_addr7bit = I2CDEV_S_ADDR;
00226         transferMCfg.tx_data = master_test ;
00227         transferMCfg.tx_length = sizeof(master_test);
00228         transferMCfg.rx_data = Master_Buf;
00229         transferMCfg.rx_length = sizeof(Master_Buf);
00230         transferMCfg.retransmissions_max = 3;
00231         I2C_MasterTransferData(I2CDEV_M, &transferMCfg, I2C_TRANSFER_POLLING);
00232 #endif
00233 
00234         pdat = Master_Buf;
00235         // Verify
00236         for (tempp = 0; tempp < sizeof(Master_Buf); tempp++){
00237                 if (*pdat++ != tempp){
00238                         _DBG_("Verify error");
00239                         break;
00240                 }
00241         }
00242         if (tempp == sizeof(Master_Buf)){
00243                 _DBG_("Verify successfully");
00244         }
00245         I2C_DeInit(I2CDEV_M);
00246     /* Loop forever */
00247     while(1);
00248     return 1;
00249 }
00250 
00251 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00252    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00253    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00254    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00255    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00256 int main(void)
00257 {
00258     return c_entry();
00259 }

00263 /*******************************************************************************
00264 * @brief                Reports the name of the source file and the source line number
00265 *                               where the CHECK_PARAM error has occurred.
00266 * @param[in]    file Pointer to the source file name
00267 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00268 * @return               None
00269 *******************************************************************************/
00270 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00271 {
00272         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00273          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00274 
00275         /* Infinite loop */
00276         while(1);
00277 }
